long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into an arcade with the Drive Mad Chrome Extension! Get instant access to the thrilling, physics-based driving game that puts your skill, patience, and reflexes to the ultimate test. Whether you’re navigating rugged terrains or attempting crazy jumps, Drive Mad promises hours of addictive gameplay right from your browser.

Why install Drive Mad?

Instant Access: Launch the game from your toolbar and dive into the action with a single click.
Seamless Gameplay: Experience smooth controls and captivating physics on every level—no downloads required!
Skill-Building Fun: Master dozens of challenging levels with unique obstacles and landscapes that require timing, balance, and precision driving.
Play More Games: Find more fun titles through the top-left menu, offering quick links to a variety of engaging games.
Stay entertained between tasks or enjoy a break with a rewarding challenge. Ready to drive through a mad world of adventure? Install Drive Mad and start your engine today!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
